text: "Don't Do Me Like That" is a 1979 song by Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers and is the leading single from their third studio album Damn the Torpedoes. It went to number 3 in Canada, number 10 in the United States (their only top 10 hit) and number 17 in New Zealand. It did not chart in the United Kingdom. == References == Category:1979 songs Category:Tom Petty and the Heartbreakers songs
title: Don't Do Me Like That
